title: The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery
description:
Who Dunnit: The Improvised Murder Mystery is now The Unusual Suspects... new name, same great show.

The hottest show in the history of the 757 is NOW A NATIONALLY TOURING SHOW!

The Unusual Suspects

There’s been a murder. Everyone is a suspect. The actors on stage. Even you.

Welcome to The Unusual Suspects, an improvised murder mystery comedy.

Throughout the night, the world’s greatest detective will interrogate a cast of unusual characters, from the wacky to the dastardly.

You’ll find yourself face to face with our notorious investigator. Could he be Sherlock, Columbo, Jessica Fletcher? Not exactly. The catch is, no one ever knows which detective will show up.

No one is above suspicion, including you and your guests.

Join us at the hit show that’s played to sold-out audiences for more than three years and counting. This isn’t your standard dinner detective fare; get ready for a wild and funny night that everyone will be talking about the next day, your family, your friends, and maybe even your priest.

The Unusual Suspects is brought to you by the writers and producers of the off-Broadway and national hit: Cuff Me: The Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody.

The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery Comedy

The second Saturday of every month at the Push Comedy Theater

The show starts at 8pm, tickets are $15

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: Push Comedy Theater at The Plot presents Tim Seibles and The Pushers
description:
Get ready for a night of poetry, comedy and the return of the Push Comedy Theater.



After nearly 4 long months, your favorite comedians are back!!!  The Push Comedy Theater is taking over The Plot for a night of comedy under the stars.  The Pushers have assembled their funniest friends for a night of improv comedy.  Joining the crew will be poet, Tim Seibles.  He’ll be providing the inspiration for the Comedy Crew’s improv scenes.



Tim Seibles is an American poet, professor and the former Poet Laureate of Virginia.  He is the author of five collections of poetry, most recently, Fast Animal (Etruscan Press, 2012). His honors include an Open Voice Award and fellowships from the National Endowment for the Arts and the Provincetown Fine Arts Work Center.  In 2012 he was nominated for a National Book Award, for Fast Animal.



Comedy at the Push Comedy Theater is back!

-Beer and Wine will be available.

-Get Select food items from the Outdoor Weiner Hole.

-Waiters and Waitresses will be on hand to bring food and drinks to your seats.

-Hand sanitizing stations will be at the entrance and at the concession stand.

-Masks are encouraged and will be provided at the ticket booth if needed.



We are limiting this event to only 50 people with 2 options for tickets.   There will be 3 rows of seats.  Each row will consist of pairs of seats grouped 6 to 8 feet from each other.  These seats will be sold in pairs.



The second tier will be individual, general admission tickets.  These tickets are for the bleachers set up behind the container garden.  Those seated at the bleachers will be placed 6 feet from each other.



If you have questions, please email us at pusherscomedy@gmail.com

title: Date Night on the Water with Push Comedy Theater
description:
We improvise your relationship.It's the most fun you'll ever have on date night!

Two lucky couples will see the story of their love unfold on stage.  Improvised by 2 of Hampton Roads' funniest and wackiest

comedians!

The couples will be selected at random and socially distanced interviewed on stage in front of the audience. The Pushers' (and Portsmouth's favorite son) Brad McMurran and a Courtney Richards will use that information to improvise the story of the couple's relationship.
For years, The Pushers have been getting to know diverse couples all across Hampton Roads with this signature piece.  Don't miss one of the Push Comedy Theater's signature shows.


The Push Comedy Theater is teaming with the Portsmouth Renaissance Hotel for a night of outdoor comedy along the Elizabeth River.

Seating will be grouped into 3 rows of tables.  Each table will be distanced 6 to 8 feet from each other.  Rows A and C are 2 top tables.  Row B are 4 top tables (4 of these tables come with fire pit centers).

There will be an additional row of single seats available (Row D).  The single seats will be distanced 6 to 8 feet from each other as well.

Food and Drink from the Renaissance Hotel will be available (see the menu provided) and you can even order your food in advance.  Just give your seat or table number when ordering.
